W

width - Variable in class org.jmedikit.lib.image.AbstractImage
Image width
windowCenter - Variable in class org.jmedikit.lib.image.AbstractImage
description @see windowWidth
windowWidth - Variable in class org.jmedikit.lib.image.AbstractImage
Window width and window center is used to map grey values to a scale of 0 - 255 Medical images usually use grey values between 0 and 4096 if window width = 200 and window center = 0 pixels between -100 and 100 are mapped values lower than -100 are mapped as black values higher than 100 are mapped as white between the pixels store values from 1 to 254
